short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily and quickly edit the URL/URI from the current page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Browser extension to easily and quickly edit the URL/URI from the current page.

* Free and open-source.
* No (extra) permissions required.
* Keyboard shortcuts.
* Intuitive and easy-to-use.
* Customizable fonts.
* Internationalized domain name support.
* Browser sync (your options are synced across devices).

Default keyboard shortcut: Ctrl+Shift+L (or Control+L on Mac)

Read more at:
https://github.com/denilsonsa/crx-uri-splitter/
